## PBRToMixedTextureType type

**Signature:**

```typescript
type PBRToMixedTextureType<T> = T extends [infer First, ...infer Rest] ? [
    First extends string ? ReturnType<typeof mixinTextureProps<First>> : never,
    ...PBRToMixedTextureType<Rest>
] : [];
```
